plot: In rural settlement Mario Lago, where about three hundred families of the MST, instead of statically ordered books are kept on the shelves of a library are placed in crates of vegetables and circulate the nuclei of the huts of peasants.
title: Leitura de Barraco
plot_es: In rural settlement Mario Lago, where about three hundred families of the MST, instead of statically ordered books are kept on the shelves of a library are placed in crates of vegetables and circulate the nuclei of the huts of peasants.
